name: 2022 4th International Conference on Intelligent Medicine and Image Processing（IMIP 2022）
content: Paper Publication: Accepted papers can be published in ACM International Conference Proceedings (ISBN: 978-1-4503-9620-2), which will be archived in ACM Digital Library, indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, submitted to be reviewed by Thomson ReutersConference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web ofScience). or Journal of Image and Graphics (JOIG, ISSN: 2301-3699), indexed by Scopus (since 2021), Google Scholar, Crossref, etc. SCI Special Issue: Selected good papers will be recommended to be submitted for publication in the Special Issue: Applied Sciences (ISSN: 2076-3417): indexed by SCIE (Web of Science), Scopus, Inspec, CAPlus/SciFinder, etc.
